blog.description: Not devoted to consistently making good art- devoted to God though! Currently geeking out over Avengers: Endgame! (For the first week, the only spoilers should be in my likes.) Overall, this blog mostly contains reposts pertaining to my favorite things: books, movies, video games, cartoons, and theater.

summary: Iron Man Three: “Mr. Stark, I am so sorry” and he immediately says “It’s not your fault, kid” Infinity War: “Mr. Stark, I don’t...
body:
Iron Man Three:

“Mr. Stark, I am so sorry” and he immediately says “It’s not your fault, kid”

Infinity War:

“Mr. Stark, I don’t feel so good” and he immediately says “You’re alright”

tags: i too would stalk peter parker
title: incorrect quote #4
body:
Aunt May: We should stop worrying about Peter and let him lead his own life.

Tony:

Aunt May:

Tony: Do you want to follow him, or should I?

Aunt May: Let’s both do it.

title: incorrect quote #2
body:
Tony: *teaching Thor how to use a phone* Okay, first of all, go to the app store.

Thor: *gets up*

Tony: Wait, where are you going?

Thor: You said to go to the app store. Is it far?

reblog.comment:
Tony: *teaching Thor how to use a phone* Okay, first of all, go to the app store.

Thor: *gets up*

Tony: Wait, where are you going?

Thor: You said to go to the app store. Is it far?

trail.content_raw:

Thor: *gets up*

trail.content:
Tony: *teaching Thor how to use a phone* Okay, first of all, go to the app store.

Thor: *gets up*

Tony: Wait, where are you going?

Thor: You said to go to the app store. Is it far?

summary: imagine tony returning home after the snap, trying to come up with a bunch of reasons and excuses to tell pepper. however she...
body: imagine tony returning home after the snap, trying to come up with a bunch of reasons and excuses to tell pepper. however she wasn’t there at the front to yell at him, nor was she in her office. tony tries calling her and sees all the missed calls, only to find her phone on the floor. he then asks friday to playback the surveillance footage, only to see pepper crumble into dust, alone and worrying frantically. now not only does he have the death of peter on his shoulders, but now the person he loved is gone too, and has nothing to return home to.

reblog.comment: imagine tony returning home after the snap, trying to come up with a bunch of reasons and excuses to tell pepper. however she wasn’t there at the front to yell at him, nor was she in her office. tony tries calling her and sees all the missed calls, only to find her phone on the floor. he then asks friday to playback the surveillance footage, only to see pepper crumble into dust, alone and worrying frantically. now not only does he have the death of peter on his shoulders, but now the person he loved is gone too, and has nothing to return home to.

tags: based on peter's wonderful driving skills in homecoming
gone are the dreaded days of practising with my parents
summary:
Peter: Since I got my permit and Aunt May is busy, can you-?
Tony: No.
Peter: Why not?
Tony: My birthday's next week. I plan on...
body:
Peter: Since I got my permit and Aunt May is busy, can you-?
Tony: No.
Peter: Why not?
Tony: My birthday's next week. I plan on making it.
Peter: Then how am I supposed to practise?
 *an hour later*
Peter: Thanks for doing this with me, Mr Rhodes.
Rhodey: Sure thing, kid. Tony assured me you're a good driv-AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAh

blog.name: ao3feed-tonystark
blog.title: Ao3-Feed: Tony Stark
blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive Of Our Own under the Tony Stark tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed.

title: Hey, It's ya boi
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2Q7Xs21

by sly_boi

No one asked for this, but I did it anyways.

Basically a clusterfuck, some type of weird and complicated (not really) plot (it’s in there somewhere, I promise), a bunch of drama (no), memes (basically just memes), and what I think would happen if the Marvel characters would attend Hogwarts. Oh, and please, feel free to hate this as much as you want. I won’t blame you.

Or, the one where everyone is trying to sort out their shit, Tony is losing his mind because of all the stupidity, Draco is just trying to be positive, Harry is a depressed lil shit, Hermione is done, Ron is adorable, Blaise and Pansy are Icons, Steve is an oblivious cinnamon roll, Natasha would rather be dead, Bruce can’t deal, Clint doesn’t know what’s going on half of the time, T'Challa is moody af, Peter is a soft lil boi who needs protection at all times, Wade is protection, Loki is seriously gonna murder that fucking Jane Foster if she doesn’t let go of his man, Thor is also an oblivious cinnamon roll, and everyone else has a headache.

And honestly, what a mood.
——
If someone could help me with a better summary and title, please do. And feedback is always helpful.

Words: 666, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Marvel, Marvel Cinematic Universe, The Avengers (Marvel Movies), The Avengers (Marvel) - All Media Types, Thor (Movies), Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling
  • Rating: Not Rated
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Categories: F/F, F/M, M/M
  • Characters: Tony Stark, Steve Rogers, Bucky Barnes, James “Bucky” Barnes, Sam Wilson, Loki, Thor, Clint Barton, James “Rhodey” Rhodes, Natasha Romanov (Marvel), Peter Parker, Peter Stark Parker, Ginny Weasley, Harry Potter, Draco Malfoy, Jane Foster (Marvel), Wade Wilson, Bruce Banner, Hermione Granger, Ron Weasley, Pansy Parkinson, Blaise Zabini, Vincent Crabbe, Gregory Goyle, Hufflepuff Student(s), Ravenclaw Student(s), Gryffindor Student(s), Slytherin Student(s), Maria Hill, Nick Fury, Minerva McGonagall, Severus Snape, Albus Dumbledore, Odin (Marvel), Frigga (Marvel), Frigga | Freyja (Marvel), Sif (Marvel), Fandral (Marvel), Volstagg (Marvel), Hogun (Marvel), Other(s), Theodore Nott
  • Relationships: Stony, thorki, Spideypool, Tony Stark/Steve Rogers, Loki/Thor, Thor/Loki, Thor/Jane Foster (One-sided), Spiderman/Deadpool, Peter Parker/Wade Wilson, Clint Barton/Bruce Banner, Natasha Romanov/Herself, Ginny Weasley/Harry Potter (one-sided), Luna Lovegood/Ginny Weasley, Draco Malfoy/Harry Potter, Hermione Granger/Pansy Parkinson, Ron Weasley/Blaise Zabini, James “Bucky” Barnes/Sam Wilson, Steve Rogers/Female Character(s) (One-sided)
  • Additional Tags: Alternate Universe - Hogwarts, Alternate Universe - Canon Divergence, I Don’t Even Know, How Do I Tag, Tony Stark Has A Heart, Tony Stark Needs a Hug, Good Draco Malfoy, Bottom Draco Malfoy, soft draco malfoy, Cute Draco Malfoy, Adorable, Fluff, Fluff and Angst, Fluff and Smut, Tooth-Rotting Fluff, Angst, Angst with a Happy Ending, Smut, Eventual Smut, I Wrote This Instead of Sleeping, I Tried, I changed everyones age, fight me, its for the plot, Peter Parker is my lil boi, he needs protection, wade wilson is protection, Ravenclaw Draco Malfoy, Slytherin Fred Weasley & George Weasley, Hufflepuff Ron Weasley, Ravenclaw Blaise Zabini, Gryffindor Pansy Parkinson, Pansy & Blaise are Bi Icons, Theodore Nott is Transexual, And Homosexual, Trans Peter Parker, Bisexual Peter Parker, Canon Non-Binary Character, Non-binary Loki, Pansexual Loki, Genderfluid Character, Genderfluid Loki (Marvel), Other Additional Tags to Be Added

title: Unlikely
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2oJdpPU

by fabric_hands

Alternate universe where the Avengers, Guardians, everyone— they live together, and everything is okay.

Have you ever wondered what it would be like if Bucky met Nebula? Or if Ant-Man had lunch with Peter Quill? Or if Doctor Strange became friends with T’challa?

Thought it is unlikely, it could happen.

(I mainly focus on rarepairs. Requests are open!)

title: Robbers
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2NiSi4T

by fandom_meet_fangirl

“I have a proposition for you,” he said, and Tony found himself in a flashback, back to a time when he had been saying those words to a much younger Peter. He hadn’t been himself back then, a far cry from the man that sat before him now.

“Which is?” Peter outright grinned, stealing the breath right from Peter’s lungs.

“You and me, right here, right now. Just like old times,” he said, and the embers that had been glowing within Tony roared to life.

In which, Peter comes back to Tony

Words: 1173, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English
